    Deprecated API

    Contents

    • Classes
    • Methods
    • Constructors
    • Deprecated Classes
      Class
      Description
      superpdf.PdfUtils
      All methods have been moved elsewhere, see each method for more details
    • Deprecated Methods
      Method
      Description
      superpdf.datatable.DataTable.getDataCellTemplateEven()
      superpdf.datatable.DataTable.getDataCellTemplateOdd()
      superpdf.image.Image.scale(float)
      Use Image.scaleByWidth(float)
      superpdf.Paragraph.getColor()
      This method will be replaced by public Color getColor() in a future release
      superpdf.Paragraph.getFontWidth()
      This method will be removed in a future release
      superpdf.Paragraph.withColor(int)
      This method will be removed in a future release
      superpdf.Paragraph.withFont(PDFont, int)
      This method will be removed in a future release
      superpdf.Paragraph.withWidth(int)
      This method will be removed in a future release
      superpdf.PdfUtils.loadFont(PDDocument, String)
      Use FontUtils.loadFont(PDDocument, String) instead
      superpdf.Table.createPage()
      Use a PageProvider instead
      superpdf.Table.setHeader(Row<T>)
      Use Table.addHeaderRow(Row) instead, as it supports multiple header rows
    • Deprecated Constructors
      Constructor
      Description
      superpdf.AbstractTemplatedTable(float, float, float, float, float, PDDocument, T, boolean, boolean)
      superpdf.AbstractTemplatedTable(float, float, float, float, PDDocument, boolean, boolean)
      superpdf.Table(float, float, float, float, float, PDDocument, T, boolean, boolean)
      Use one of the constructors that pass a PageProvider
      superpdf.Table(float, float, float, float, PDDocument, boolean, boolean)
      Use one of the constructors that pass a PageProvider
